structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Enactment of parking ordinances by local government.
law.text: Any local government may enact parking ordinances and impose penalties for the violation of such ordinances. Such penalties may be enforced as criminal penalties or a local government may, by ordinance, elect to enforce parking ordinances as civil violations pursuant to the procedures set forth in KRS 82.600 to 82.640.
law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 416, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1984.
